title: How to Recover Your Xbox Account on iPhone or iPad

steps.headline: Open your iPhone or iPad's internet browser.
steps.description: You can use any mobile browser such as Safari, Firefox, Chrome or Opera.

steps.headline: Go to account.live.com/password/reset in your browser.
steps.description: Type or paste the URL web link into the address bar, and hit the Go button on your keyboard.

steps.headline: Select I forgot my password on the Recovery page.
steps.description: This option will allow you to reset your account password.

steps.headline: Tap the blue Next button.
steps.description: This will prompt you to enter your account email on the next page.

steps.headline: Enter your email address into the text field.
steps.description: Tap the text field on the "Recover your account" page, and enter the email address associated with your Microsoft Live account. Alternatively, you can enter your phone number or Skype ID here.

steps.headline: Enter the captcha into the text field at the bottom.
steps.description: Type the characters you see in the picture into the text field here. This will verify you're a human and not a malicious bot. If you can't read the characters, tap New to refresh and get a new picture. Alternatively, you can tap Audio and listen to an audio clip instead of the picture.

steps.headline: Tap the blue Next button.
steps.description: This will confirm your email address, and take you to the identity verification page.

steps.headline: Select a method for receiving your verification code.
steps.description: In order to verify your identity and recover your account, you'll receive a code in an automated message. You can select to receive your code via email or text message here. If you don't have a phone number saved to your account, you'll automatically skip this step and receive your verification code in your email.

steps.headline: Tap Send code.
steps.description: This will send your verification code to your email or phone.

steps.headline: Enter your verification code.
steps.description: Tap the "Enter the code" field, and type your verification code here.

steps.headline: Tap the Next button.
steps.description: This will verify your identity, and allow you to create a new password on the next page.

steps.headline: Create a new password for your account.
steps.description: Tap the "New password" field, and type the new password you want to use for your Microsoft Live account. Your password has to be at least 8 characters. All Microsoft Live passwords are case-sensitive.

steps.headline: Enter the same password into the "Reenter password" field.
steps.description: Make sure this field exactly matches your new password in the New password field.

steps.headline: Tap the Next button.
steps.description: This will change your account password. You can now log into your Xbox account with your new password.

text: Open your iPhone or iPad's internet browser. You can use any mobile browser such as Safari, Firefox, Chrome or Opera. Go to account.live.com/password/reset in your browser. Type or paste the URL web link into the address bar, and hit the Go button on your keyboard. Select I forgot my password on the Recovery page. This option will allow you to reset your account password. Tap the blue Next button. This will prompt you to enter your account email on the next page. Enter your email address into the text field. Tap the text field on the "Recover your account" page, and enter the email address associated with your Microsoft Live account. Alternatively, you can enter your phone number or Skype ID here. Enter the captcha into the text field at the bottom. Type the characters you see in the picture into the text field here. This will verify you're a human and not a malicious bot. If you can't read the characters, tap New to refresh and get a new picture. Alternatively, you can tap Audio and listen to an audio clip instead of the picture. Tap the blue Next button. This will confirm your email address, and take you to the identity verification page. Select a method for receiving your verification code. In order to verify your identity and recover your account, you'll receive a code in an automated message. You can select to receive your code via email or text message here. If you don't have a phone number saved to your account, you'll automatically skip this step and receive your verification code in your email. Tap Send code. This will send your verification code to your email or phone. Enter your verification code. Tap the "Enter the code" field, and type your verification code here. Tap the Next button. This will verify your identity, and allow you to create a new password on the next page. Create a new password for your account. Tap the "New password" field, and type the new password you want to use for your Microsoft Live account. Your password has to be at least 8 characters. All Microsoft Live passwords are case-sensitive. Enter the same password into the "Reenter password" field. Make sure this field exactly matches your new password in the New password field. Tap the Next button. This will change your account password. You can now log into your Xbox account with your new password.
